Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Thursday 4-5pm report. Bucks connector trail has man made and fresh with plenty to glide out to trail with tracks set. New snow also added on north/south section in woods along driving range on Bucks. Fast and hard pack with still some dirty snow and debris in sections. Classic tracks were deep and wide. Friday should be great if they do a nice groom in the morning. 2-3” expected Friday, let’s hope forecasters are accurate this time. Hoping park crew can roll or groom the other trails for Saturday. Thanks HM crew, your hard work is appreciated!

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Skiing is awesome with a 24" base of natural snow and daily power tilling.  All trails are open.  Save $20 on race registration by registering online at SKIREG.com by 10 pm tonight!

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 7 chairlifts, conveyor and the rope tow.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were power-tilled and tracked this morning conditions are excellent.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m. There is a special night skiing session this Sunday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: Two inches of light, dry and fluffy snow fell at Nub's this morning. The new snow will further improve the already good conditions. The majority of the snow surface is expertly machine groomed. The temperature will reach the upper 20's today and the wind is light, making for ideal conditions for a day on the slopes. The XC trails are groomed. The soup of the day is clam chowder. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food and an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 p.m. so we can groom for night skiing. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
